name: The Pair of Docks
description:
You are the captain of the Paradox. You are in charge of delivering pairs of socks to the inhabitants of opposing lands. You will travel between pairs of docks to deliver these pairs of socks, while avoiding dangerous obstacles. Avoid damaging your ship and losing inventory to make the most profit.

Use the A and D keys to move your ship left and right. Use the mouse to aim your cannon and use the left mouse button to fire it.

Credits
Marty Hanapole - Programming, Effects, UI
Chris Rouck - 3D Artwork, Music
Kevin Flint - Programming
Michael Pigeon - Programming

Made during the VTGP Spring 2021 Game Jam
